title: Calories in a 7-Eleven Slurpee
meta_description: Discover calories in a 711 slurpee, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition for a medium size, plus tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Medium size (16 oz / 473 ml), typical fruit-flavored like cherry, frozen carbonated beverage, no add-ins.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, size, brand location, and customizations. Check in-store info or app when available.

quick_answer.text: A medium 7-Eleven Slurpee contains about 250 calories, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Small size (12 oz) instead of medium
Large size (22 oz) instead of medium

faqs.q: How many calories in a 711 slurpee medium?
faqs.a: Approximately 250 kcal for a standard medium 7-Eleven Slurpee.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a 711 slurpee?
faqs.a: Yes, about 65 g of carbs per medium, nearly all from 60 g sugars.

faqs.q: Does a 711 slurpee have fat or protein?
faqs.a: No significant fat or protein; it's 0 g for both in a typical serving.

faqs.q: How do calories vary by 711 slurpee size?
faqs.a: Small (12 oz) ≈170 kcal, medium (16 oz) ≈250 kcal, large (22 oz) ≈350 kcal.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in a 711 slurpee?
faqs.a: Low at about 20 mg per medium Slurpee, from the carbonation and flavoring.
